title: Can't post in forums
body: So i need a little mod help here. Its saying i can't post in the forums--aside from Help and Behavior, and Bug report until im at least level 6, level 7, etc. This account is currently level 10. So i dont know whats going on or how to fix it. Can i have some help please? What's wrong here and what do i need to do to fix it?

replies.body: omg I can talk on this one
Same problem i can not post any where!!! Whats going on?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LThkdh7A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-16T20:46:52.297+0000)
>
> It can take a moment for your account to sync up to the boards.  Is everything okay now?

I can't post either, beside here.
It can take a moment for your account to sync up to the boards.  Is everything okay now?
I have the same problem, I'm level 10 but it shows I'm level 3 and can't post anything or reply. {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LThkdh7A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-16T20:46:52.297+0000)
>
> It can take a moment for your account to sync up to the boards.  Is everything okay now?

Yes it has! thank you~! <3 If its in your power to do so feel free to delete this topic, since the issue has been resolved <3
